name: session-tunes
description: Use cases: 1. Identify tunes to learn 1. Search for tunes based on tune characteristics 1. Enable practicing tunes by playing multiple tunes as a set 1. Create a version that will work seamlessly on mobile 1. Be able to recognize tunes 1. Suggest chords for a tune 1. Process audio input in real time 1. Allow for exporting tunes in many file formats (abc, MusicXml) 1. Define sessions by name and location 1. Update session data live using wave file (autorecognition) 1. Interface for building a set of tunes
